title: Chili Pizza from Hormel
directions: Spread cheese dip over pizza crusts. Spoon chili over cheese sauce.
Top with shredded lettuce and diced tomatoes. Top with corn chips, olives and diced onions, if desired.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can HORMEL Chili No Beans
Corn chips, black olives and diced onions, if desired
